attributes.action: To force the House of Commons to debate this petition
attributes.background: Convicted criminal Fiona Onasanya has now been ousted from her constituency for perjury committed in a Court of Law in January 2019. Make all her voting actions within the House of Commons null and void from that January 2019. Democracy in the UK demands Parliamentarians are not criminals.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to discount MPs' votes.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235755
